message: Use A,D to move, Space to interact, use TAB to open/close inventory
This is short story about hope and strength of mind
Once man awake at the strange place...

I use transmitter and sending "SOS" again and again.
When the battery is over, speaker say:
"Coast patrol listen. Rescue group on the way"

I can't do anything more today and wait next day.
At dawn waves throw on shore more strange objects
